description: Show the full details of a service type unit of measure quantity, including quantities, relationship details, and customer/broker calculated amounts and rates when visible.
permissions: Access is controlled by ServiceTypeUnitOfMeasureQuantityPolicy scope. Non-admin access is limited to time-card quantified quantities tied to tenders/jobs the user can access as a broker, trucker, or customer member; customer/trucker visibility requires exclude_from_time_card_invoices to be false.
